intro: Neoregelia tigrina, commonly known as the Tiger Pitcher, is a striking epiphytic bromeliad native to Brazil. It is characterized by its vibrant, colorful leaves that often display intricate patterns resembling a tiger’s stripes. The plant produces striking, long-lasting inflorescences that can range in color from red to orange. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires high humidity and well-draining soil. Neoregelia tigrina is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
